ygData.subject: Re: FREEPORT NECRO guild is where?
ygData.msgSnippet: As a Human necro, I could get to the bank no problems.  As a Darkelf necro, I can go to west and south Freeport without any nastiness (avoiding merchants of
ygData.messageBody:
As a Human necro, I could get to the bank no problems. As a Darkelf necro,
I can go to west and south Freeport without any nastiness (avoiding
merchants of course) but north freeport guards are KOS. Never played a
gnome, perhaps one of our other dark brothers and sisters can shed some
insight. There are secret doors in the city walls outside both gates, just
hug the wall until you pop into a tunnel, you'll eventually hear
spellcasting and end up in the guild.

----- Original Message -----
From: Mata <mata_eq@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, June 07, 1999 8:03 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] FREEPORT NECRO guild is where?


2 questions . . . I am a gnome necromancer . ..

1) Can I go to the bank in freeport and get money for necro guild or will I
be KOS in bank zone. (Ins't the bank in North Freeport?)

2) If I wanted to play it safe, get my money from Akkanon bank then take
boat to Freeport, HOW DO I GET to the NECROGUILD from the outside. So guy
told me there is a passage from the wall in west free port that goes into
the necro guild from outside and I was wondering if anyone could give me
specifics on oing this.
